title: "Trousdale Ventures Invests In Preamble, One Of The First Platforms To Offer Ethical AI Moderation"
excerpt: "Trousdale Ventures, a privately held investment firm, (  ), today announced it had invested in Preamble, one of the first platforms to develop software to offer ethical AI to social networks. The seed round will be used to further develop the platform and enable the company to onboard and collaborate with non-profits."
